sentences.english: As she told me about her newly improved cooking skills, Cody grinned.
sentences.chinese: 当她告诉我最近她厨艺大涨的时候，科迪咧嘴一笑。

sentences.english: He studied gastronomy but cannot make a living as a cook.
sentences.chinese: 他学习了烹饪但却无法靠厨艺过活。

sentences.english: The good thing is, he has made great progress in cooking.
sentences.chinese: 好在他现在厨艺大有长进。

sentences.english: K. Fisher in her book “The Gastronomical Me, ” Ms. Stuart liked to cook Sunday dinners for them.
sentences.chinese: 她有一手好厨艺，在周日晚上经常给他们做晚餐。

sentences.english: They can learn cooking skills, which are always in great demand.
sentences.chinese: 他们可以学习需求量一直很大的厨艺。

sentences.english: The embroidery pays attention to elaboration hard, but the cooking calculate greatly of talent more vivid.
sentences.chinese: 女红讲究细心认真，厨艺却更看重天分灵活。

sentences.english: In China, belches are considered an indication of your satisfaction and a compliment to the chef on a job well done.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，打嗝可以体现你的满意，以及对厨艺的赞赏。

sentences.english: She's a first-rate sister-in-law, a great cook, witty and also kind.
sentences.chinese: 她真是第一等的小姑子，厨艺一流，机智友好。

sentences.english: The finest Manhattan chefs were chauffeured uptown to give her private cooking classes.
sentences.chinese: 司机接来曼哈顿最好的厨师，在家里给她上厨艺课。

sentences.english: Cooking classes are a great way of telling your significant other that they suck at cooking.
sentences.chinese: 烹饪班是告诉你的另一半她厨艺很糟的礼物。

sentences.english: Presently takes on the Chengdu some high-level commerce hotel long concurrently total kitchen assistant.
sentences.chinese: 现担成都某高级商务酒店厨艺长兼总厨助理。

sentences.english: She was pardonably proud of his wonderful cooking.
sentences.chinese: 她夸自己厨艺了得，是情有可原的。

sentences.english: To which fair cousin should I compliment the excellence of the cooking?
sentences.chinese: 是哪位堂妹的厨艺如此高超，令我称赞不已？

sentences.english: If you follow all of these tips, your cooking will improve dramatically.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能照做，厨艺会大大提高。

sentences.english: Shun Xing is also a cultural and culinary destination in itself.
sentences.chinese: 实质上，顺兴还是一座文化和厨艺的圣地。

definition: to go to the kitchen (to prepare a meal)/to cook
to be in charge of the cooking/to be the chef/head cook/chef
to show off one's abilities/to exhibit one's skills
